page.title: 08Recreation W. Grove
page.content: Grove adults are beginning to form their own societies to which Wantage people are welcome. These new activities are aimed at the young parents' needs, like the Grove Theatre Group, formed this year as a breakaway from The Harlequins of Wantage. They plan to perform Murder Play by Brian Burton and After Margritte by Tom Stoppard, on June 29th. The Grove Horticultural Society meets monthly. The gardens of Grove are beginning to look established and attractive after 10-15 years. The Grove Ladies Social Club are going on a Thames Cruise in June to listen to a talk by an Oxfam Outworker. There are also many classes held at the Grove Adult Education Centre ranging from sport to language, cooking and the arts.
